jobs.title: Home Based Sales Professional
jobs.description:
Are you a driven and motivated individual, with a want or need to earn from the comfort of your own home? If so, we want you!

HostMamba are hiring home based professionals to join our growing sales force in the UK. In return we offer lead generation training, call scripts, fantastic products, and great rates of commission.

All you need to get started is a stable internet connection, a computer, and a phone.

THE ROLE

During the probationary first month, you will be required to be logged in Monday - Friday 09:00 - 17:00, and during this time you will be paid on a commission only contract. After the probationary period, providing you have met sales targets, you will be offered a salaried position. You will also be able to choose more flexible hours to suit your needs.

For all direct sales you will earn the following commission;

Up to £2000/week - 5%
£2000 - £4000/week - 10%
Over £4000/week - 20%

By the end of the 1st month, our home based sales professionals will typically be able to sell more than £4000 each week (selling £4000 per week will pay £800 commission), though the target that we want people to meet in order to be offered a salaried position after the probation is just £2000 per week. With average sales per customer equating £1000 - £2000, these are easy targets to hit!

What are you waiting for? Apply Now!
